00013 static char help[] = "Solves 3D PBE using FEM, MG, DA and Matrix-Free methods.\n\n";
00014 //Don't want time to be synchronized. Need to check load imbalance.
00015 #ifdef MPI_WTIME_IS_GLOBAL
00016 #undef MPI_WTIME_IS_GLOBAL
00017 #endif
00018 
00019 int main(int argc, char ** argv ) {     
00020   int size, rank;
00021   unsigned int numPts;
00022   char pFile[50],oFile[50];
00023   double gSize[3];
00024   unsigned int ptsLen;
00025   unsigned int maxNumPts= 1;
00026   unsigned int dim=3;
00027   unsigned int maxDepth=30;
00028   DendroIntL locSz, totalSz;
00029   std::vector<ot::TreeNode> linOct, balOct;
00030   std::vector<double> pts;
00031 
00032   PetscInitialize(&argc,&argv,"optionsDS",help);
00033   ot::RegisterEvents();
00034 
00035   ot::DAMG_Initialize(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00036 
00037 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00038   int stages[3];
00039   PetscLogStageRegister(&stages[0],"P2O.");
00040   PetscLogStageRegister(&stages[1],"Bal");  
00041   PetscLogStageRegister(&stages[2],"Solve");  
00042 #endif
00043 
00044   MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD,&size);
00045   MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD,&rank);
00046   if(argc < 2) {
00047     std::cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << "inpfile  maxDepth[30] \
00048       dim[3] maxNumPtsPerOctant[1] " << std::endl;
00049     return -1;
00050   }
00051   if(argc > 2) {
00052     maxDepth = atoi(argv[2]);
00053   }
00054   if(argc > 3) {
00055     dim = atoi(argv[3]);
00056   }
00057   if(argc > 4) {
00058     maxNumPts = atoi(argv[4]);
00059   }
00060 
00061   sprintf(pFile,"%s%d_%d.pts",argv[1],rank,size);
00062   sprintf(oFile,"%s_Out%d_%d.pts",argv[1],rank,size);
00063 
00064   //Points2Octree....
00065   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00066   if(!rank){
00067     std::cout << " reading  "<<pFile<<std::endl; // Point size
00068   }
00069   ot::readPtsFromFile(pFile, pts);
00070   if(!rank){
00071     std::cout << " finished reading  "<<pFile<<std::endl; // Point size
00072   }
00073   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00074   ptsLen = pts.size();
00075   std::vector<ot::TreeNode> tmpNodes;
00076   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < ptsLen; i += 3) {
00077     if( (pts[i] > 0.0) &&
00078         (pts[i+1] > 0.0)  
00079         && (pts[i+2] > 0.0) &&
00080         ( (static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i]*(static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)))) < (1u<<maxDepth))  &&
00081         ( (static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i+1]*(static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)))) < (1u<<maxDepth))  &&
00082         ( (static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i+2]*(static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)))) < (1u<<maxDepth)) ) {
00083       tmpNodes.push_back( ot::TreeNode(
00084             static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i]*static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)),
00085             static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i+1]*static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)),
00086             static_cast<unsigned int>(pts[i+2]*static_cast<double>(1u<<maxDepth)),
00087             maxDepth,dim,maxDepth) );
00088     }
00089   }
00090   pts.clear();
00091   par::removeDuplicates<ot::TreeNode>(tmpNodes,false,MPI_COMM_WORLD);   
00092   linOct = tmpNodes;
00093   tmpNodes.clear();
00094   par::partitionW<ot::TreeNode>(linOct, NULL,MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00095   // reduce and only print the total ...
00096   locSz = linOct.size();
00097   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00098   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00099   if(rank==0) {
00100     std::cout<<"# pts= " << totalSz<<std::endl;
00101   }
00102   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00103 
00104   pts.resize(3*(linOct.size()));
00105   ptsLen = (3*(linOct.size()));
00106   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < linOct.size(); i++) {
00107     pts[3*i] = (((double)(linOct[i].getX())) + 0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00108     pts[(3*i)+1] = (((double)(linOct[i].getY())) +0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00109     pts[(3*i)+2] = (((double)(linOct[i].getZ())) +0.5)/((double)(1u << maxDepth));
00110   }//end for i
00111   linOct.clear();
00112   gSize[0] = 1.;
00113   gSize[1] = 1.;
00114   gSize[2] = 1.;
00115 
00116   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00117 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00118   PetscLogStagePush(stages[0]);
00119 #endif
00120   ot::points2Octree(pts, gSize, linOct, dim, maxDepth, maxNumPts, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00121 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00122   PetscLogStagePop();
00123 #endif
00124   // reduce and only print the total ...
00125   locSz = linOct.size();
00126   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00127   if(rank==0) {
00128     std::cout<<"# of Unbalanced Octants: " << totalSz<<std::endl;
00129   }
00130   pts.clear();
00131 
00132   //Balancing...
00133   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00134 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00135   PetscLogStagePush(stages[1]);
00136 #endif
00137   ot::balanceOctree (linOct, balOct, dim, maxDepth, true, MPI_COMM_WORLD, NULL, NULL);
00138 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00139   PetscLogStagePop();
00140 #endif
00141   linOct.clear();
00142   // compute total inp size and output size
00143   locSz = balOct.size();
00144   par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&locSz, &totalSz, 1, MPI_SUM, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00145 
00146   if(!rank) {
00147     std::cout << "# of Balanced Octants: "<< totalSz << std::endl;       
00148   }
00149 
00150   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00151 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00152   PetscLogStagePush(stages[2]);
00153 #endif
00154 
00155 
00156   ot::DAMG        *damg;    
00157   int       nlevels = 1; //number of multigrid levels
00158   unsigned int       dof =1;// degrees of freedom per node  
00159 
00160   PetscInt nlevelsPetscInt = nlevels;
00161   PetscOptionsGetInt(0, "-nlevels", &nlevelsPetscInt, 0);
00162   nlevels = nlevelsPetscInt;
00163 
00164   // Note: The user context for all levels will be set separately later.
00165   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00166 
00167   if(!rank) {
00168     std::cout<<"nlevels initial: "<<nlevels<<std::endl;
00169   }
00170 
00171   ot::DAMGCreateAndSetDA(PETSC_COMM_WORLD, nlevels, NULL, &damg,
00172       balOct, dof, 1.5, false, true);
00173 
00174   if(!rank) {
00175     std::cout<<"nlevels final: "<<nlevels<<std::endl;
00176   }
00177 
00178   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);  
00179 
00180   if(!rank) {
00181     std::cout << "Created DA for all levels."<< std::endl;
00182   }
00183 
00184   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00185   ot::PrintDAMG(damg);
00186   MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00187 
00188   ot::DA* dac = damg[0]->da;
00189 
00190   std::vector<double> outputPts;
00191 
00192   if(dac->iAmActive()) {
00193     double factor = (1.0/(static_cast<double>(1u << maxDepth)));
00194     for(dac->init<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>();
00195         dac->curr() < dac->end<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>();
00196         dac->next<ot::DA_FLAGS::WRITABLE>() ) {
00197       Point currPt = dac->getCurrentOffset();
00198       outputPts.push_back(currPt.x()*factor);
00199       outputPts.push_back(currPt.y()*factor);
00200       outputPts.push_back(currPt.z()*factor);
00201     } 
00202   }
00203 
00204   ot::writePtsToFile(oFile, outputPts);
00205   outputPts.clear();
00206 
00207   DAMGDestroy(damg);
00208 
00209   if (!rank) {
00210     std::cout << GRN << "Destroyed DAMG" << NRM << std::endl;
00211   }
00212 
00213 #ifdef PETSC_USE_LOG
00214   PetscLogStagePop();
00215 #endif
00216   balOct.clear();
00217 
00218   if (!rank) {
00219     std::cout << GRN << "Finalizing ..." << NRM << std::endl;
00220   }
00221   ot::DAMG_Finalize();
00222   PetscFinalize();
00223 }//end function
